title: The Aftermath (1982 Horror) What comes after World War III?

sources.title: The Aftermath (1982 Horror) What comes after World War III?
sources.description:
After returning to a devastated Earth, astronaut Newman confronts the ruthless Cutter and his gang, battling mutants and rescuing survivors in a post-apocalyptic Los Angeles. Fueled by vengeance after personal tragedy, Newman embarks on a relentless mission to restore justice in the wasteland

Original title: The Aftermath

Director: Steve Barkett
Writers: Steve Barkett, Stanley Livingston

Main cast:
Steve Barkett – Newman
Lynne Margulies – Sarah
Sid Haig – Cutter
Christopher Barkett – Chris
Alfie Martin – Getman

Genres: Action, Horror, Sci-Fi, Thriller
Release date: March 22, 1982 (USA)
Filming location: Los Angeles, California, USA

@CultCinemaClassics
